mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cost(heji, fangzu, shui, dian, qiche, canyin, haocai, shebei, tuiguang,date)VALUES (#{heji},#{fangzu},#{shui},#{dian},#{qiche},#{canyin},#{haocai},#{shebei},#{tuiguang},#{date});
mapper.update: UPDATE log SET note=#{note} WHERE logid=#{logid}
UPDATE log SET dflag=1 WHERE logid IN #{item}
